titleStmt.title: The Salsbury-ballad with the learned commentaries of a friend to the authors memory.
titleStmt.author: Pope, Walter, d. 1714.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome, at the Gun at the West-end of St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "O Salisbury people, give ear to my song,".
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the Gun at the West-end of St. Paul's Church-Yard
